com.rogansoft.sync

Interface ISyncable


  • public interface ISyncable
    ISyncable must be implemented by class that represents data to be synced.

    Includes:

    • Property accessors to remote datastore id
    • Property accessors to "last updated" sequence number
    • Methods to map fields between remote and local datastores
    Author:
    SAS

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Long getLastUpdatedSequence()
      Getter for "last updated" sequence number.
      java.lang.String getRemoteId()
      Getter for remote id that uniquely identifies syncable data item.
      void mapFromLocal(ISyncable local)
      Map fields from local syncable data instance.
      void mapFromRemote(ISyncable remote)
      Map fields from remote syncable data instance.

      Setter for "last updated" sequence number.
      void setRemoteId(java.lang.String id)
      Setter for remote id that uniquely identifies syncable data item.

    • Method Detail

      • getRemoteId

        java.lang.String getRemoteId()
        Getter for remote id that uniquely identifies syncable data item. Used by syncmanager to match local/remote syncable items.
        Returns:
        Remote datastore id

      • setRemoteId

        void setRemoteId(java.lang.String id)
        Setter for remote id that uniquely identifies syncable data item.
        Parameters:
        id - Remote datastore id

      • getLastUpdatedSequence

        java.lang.Long getLastUpdatedSequence()
        Getter for "last updated" sequence number.
        Returns:
        Last updated sequence number

      • setLastUpdatedSequence

        void setLastUpdatedSequence(java.lang.Long value)
        Setter for "last updated" sequence number.
        Parameters:
        value - Last updated sequence number

      • mapFromRemote

        void mapFromRemote(ISyncable remote)
        Map fields from remote syncable data instance.
        Parameters:
        remote - Remote syncable item to map from

      • mapFromLocal

        void mapFromLocal(ISyncable local)
        Map fields from local syncable data instance.
        Parameters:
        local - Local syncable item to map from
